attributes.name: Niacin
attributes.title: Niacin
attributes.description: 'Lonza produces most of the worlds supply of niacin. Its processing plant is located in Visp, Switzerland.'

attributes.name: Ferrous Sulfate
attributes.title: Ferrous Sulfate
attributes.description: ' Crown Technology in Indianapolis, Indiana is the largest producer of ferrous sulfate in the U.S'

attributes.name: Thiamin Mononitrate (Vitamin B1)
attributes.title: Thiamin Mononitrate (Vitamin B1)
attributes.description: 'The process by which the thiamine mononitrate food additive is created is a particularly well guarded trade secret, and often varies from country to country. However, one of the most well known producers is the joint venture by the German company BASF and the Tianjin Zhongjin Pharmaceutical Company. They run the worlds largest thiamine mononitrate plant, which is located north of Beijing.'

attributes.name: Riboflavin (Vitamin B2)
attributes.title: Riboflavin (Vitamin B2)
attributes.description: 'The largest producer of B2 in the world is Guangji Pharmaceuticals, located in Hubei, China'

attributes.name: Folic Acid
attributes.title: Folic Acid
attributes.description: 'The largest producer of B9 is Nuitang Chemical Inc, located in Changzhou, China.'
